attributes.action: New Highway Code rules - cyclists to pay road tax and insurance for road use
attributes.additional_details: If cyclists can use the whole road with more priority than cars then they should also pay road tax equivalent and be insured
attributes.background: If cyclists have higher priority than motor vehicles then they should pay equal road use taxes and be insured for the road

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
